cruelcumber.title: Cruelcumber
cruelcumber.description: Poky little vegetables that often trouble travellers, but are terribly sour losers.
cruelcumber.secondaryDescription: The violent vestiges of veggies vetoed by unadventurous eaters. They fight for the favour they didn't find as food.
